data.title: Promising Practice: Equity-exclusive Licensing
data.excerpt: Rabin Woods and Chasom Brown are partners at Cannabis House, a retail storefront in Los Angeles. They are using their unique backgrounds operations, finance, and civic engagement to create a space that supports their community and helps uplift other cannabis business entrepreneurs.

og_meta.site_description: Learn about California cannabis laws and licenses
